DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, 24-week study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of AXS-02 in patients with CRPS-I.
DOC.brief_title: CREATE-1: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of AXS-02 in Patients With CRPS-1
